item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.content:encoded:
True dat on answering questions. This is how I got started on SSIS: answering questions on SQLServerCentral.

It shouldn’t even be necessary to lurk around. Just dive in and start answering questions. For some reason, the Google skills of a certain percentage of question askers is really awful, so even if you don’t know the answer, try it out for yourself and try to find the solution. This will really help you to improve your skills.
